name: Ladder Leap
description:
This is a fixed version of a game I made during a weekend game jam. People thought it was pretty cool and so I just fixed it a bit to make it more fair for the player. Do you guys think that the broken ladders are too easy to spot? Should I make them look more similar to the fixed ladders? Let me know, thanks!

Here is the in browser game jam version: https://yuneek.itch.io/test-build-ladderzone
